title: Control Framework Mapping
description: A GRC analyst must map the company's internal security controls to a new compliance framework (e.g., ISO 27001).

tasks.description: Import the new ISO 27001 control framework into the GRC tool.
tasks.expected_outcome: The new framework is successfully loaded into the tool.

tasks.description: For each ISO 27001 control, identify and map the corresponding internal company control that satisfies it.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully creates a comprehensive mapping between the external framework and internal controls.

tasks.description: Identify any gaps where an ISO 27001 control is not covered by an existing internal control and create a plan to remediate the gap.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst uses the mapping exercise to identify and plan the remediation of compliance gaps.
